messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 961
messages.msgSnippet: I am sorry to hear that Laura is unsubbing for reasons of not being properly welcomed on the list.  I have been on the list for several months and there have
messages.messageBody:
I am sorry to hear that Laura is unsubbing for reasons of not being properly
welcomed on the list.  I have been on the list for several months and there
have been times my questions have not been answered either, and larger,
hotter questions take precedence.  Maybe we could all do our part a little
more to attend to the smaller simpler details, ie, connecting with one
anothers' everyday lives. Not intended to disparage any creative, respectful
discussion of a more political nature.

cath
